hero.title: About Founder Groundworks

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To build founders from the ground up by providing institutional support, strategic guidance, and the tools necessary to build responsibly and sustainably.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where every founder has the foundation, knowledge, and support to build companies that create lasting value and positive impact.

framework.description: Our unique framework for building strong foundations.

values.title: Our Values
